name: Catch Three RGB
description:
• Controls.
    • Browser:
      • Move Left - A or Left Arrow
      • Move Right - D or Right Arrow
      • MENU: Mouse.
    • Android:
      • Move - Swipe Left or Right.
      • MENU: Touch
Catch Three RGB

Move from Left to Right while trying to avoid or collect the coloured (colored) falling objects. Red, Green and Blue - Collect all three for a bonus and to reset your colour.

Make sure to only collect the correct colours, remember your colour mixing or suffer the consequences! ie. Red + Green = Yellow... you had better collect Blue next or... Game Over! 

** NB: No persistent data saving yet. Score and Pickups are per session only ** *** This is a Beta build, comments and suggestions would be greatly appreciated ***
